Class AdvanceDefaultBlockResolver<T,X,C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.AdvanceDefaultBlockResolver<T,X,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the runtime type of the dataflow
    X - the type system type
    C - the runtime context
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvanceBlockResolver<T,X,C>

    public class AdvanceDefaultBlockResolver<T,X,C>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvanceBlockResolver<T,X,C>
    Class that locates and creates blocks based on their name.

    akarnokd, 2011.09.28.
